    Hello World!

    September 30, 2022 less than 1 minute read

    Hello there, this my first blog post.

    class HelloWorld
   def initialize(name)
      @name = name.capitalize
   end
   def say
      puts "Hello #{@name}!"
   end
end

hello = HelloWorld.new("Max")
hello.say

    Tags: code, hello_world, Ruby
